price: Anataka kukutoeni katika nchi yenu. Basi mnatoa shauri gani?.
arabic: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنۡ أَرۡضِكُمۡۖ فَمَاذَا تَأۡمُرُونَ
footnotes: Na yeye ameelekeza lengo lake akupokonyeni ufalme wenu, na akutoeni katika nchi yenu kwa uchawi wake na yatayo tokea hapo kwa kuwavutia watu wamili na wamfuate. Basi tazameni, mnaamrisha njia gani ya kutokana naye huyu?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yurīdu an yukh'rijakum min arḍikum famādhā tamurūna
